languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Эльдарка{/g} чуть меняет положение и наклоняет голову. На ее губах появляется тень улыбки.{/n} "Мое сердце поет при мысли о скором освобождении Лилэтан... но мы не должны знать покоя, пока слуги Сай'лантреш язвят лик Первозданного мира".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эльдарка чуть меняет положение и наклоняет голову. На ее губах появляется тень улыбки.{/n} "Мое сердце поет при мысли о скором освобождении Лилэтана... но мы не должны знать покоя, пока пока слуги Сай'лантреш язвят лик Первозданного мира".

languages.text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} shifts slightly and lowers her head. A ghost of a smile appears on her lips.{/n} "My heart sings at the thought of the Lilaethan's approaching liberation... but we must not rest while Sai'lanthresh's servants still mar the face of the Maiden World."
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Эльдарка{/g} чуть меняет положение и наклоняет голову. На ее губах появляется тень улыбки.{/n} "Мое сердце поет при мысли о скором освобождении Лилэтан... но мы не должны знать покоя, пока слуги Сай'лантреш язвят лик Первозданного мира".

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman shifts slightly and lowers her head. A ghost of a smile appears on her lips.{/n} "My heart sings at the thought of the Lilaethan's approaching liberation... but we must not rest while the wormhole still maims the face of the Maiden World."

{n}The woman shifts slightly and lowers her head. A ghost of a smile appears on her lips.{/n} "My heart sings at the thought of the Lilaethan's approaching liberation... but we must not rest while the wormhole still maims the face of the Maiden World."

{n}The Aeldar shifts slightly and lowers her head. A ghost of a smile appears on her lips.{/n} "My heart sings at the thought of the Lilaethan's approaching liberation... but we must not rest while Sai'lantresh' servants still mar the face of the Maiden World."

{n}The Eldar woman shifts slightly and lowers her head. A ghost of a smile appears on her lips.{/n} "My heart sings at the thought of the Lilaethan's approaching liberation... but we must not rest while the canker still mars the face of the Maiden World."

{n}The Aeldar shifts slightly and lowers her head. A ghost of a smile appears on her lips.{/n} "My heart sings at the thought of the Lilaethan's approaching liberation... but we must not rest while Sai'lantresh' servants still mar the face of the Maiden World."

{n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} shifts slightly and lowers her head. A ghost of a smile appears on her lips.{/n} "My heart sings at the thought of the Lilaethan's approaching liberation... but we must not rest while Sai'lanthresh's servants still mar the face of the Maiden World."

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}伊莉耶特低下了头，微微地晃着身子，嘴边露出了一抹微笑。{/n}“一想到莉莱赞即将得到解放，我的心就情不自禁地歌唱起来……但赛·兰斯雷什的仆从依然在破坏这个世界的面貌，我们还不能休息。”
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} shifts slightly and lowers her head. A ghost of a smile appears on her lips.{/n} "My heart sings at the thought of the Lilaethan's approaching liberation... but we must not rest while Sai'lanthresh's servants still mar the face of the Maiden World."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}伊莉耶特低下了头，微微地晃着身子，嘴边露出了一抹微笑。{/n}“一想到莉莱赞即将得到解放，我的心就情不自禁地歌唱起来……但赛·兰斯雷什的仆从依然在破坏这个世界的面貌，我们还不能休息。”

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}が少しうつむく。その口元には消え入りそうな微笑が浮かんでいた。{/n}「リラエタンが間もなく自由になると思えば、心が躍る…だが、セランスレッシュの従者が今なお、このメイデンワールドの地表を傷つけているのであれば、休んでいる暇はない」
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} shifts slightly and lowers her head. A ghost of a smile appears on her lips.{/n} "My heart sings at the thought of the Lilaethan's approaching liberation... but we must not rest while Sai'lanthresh's servants still mar the face of the Maiden World."

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}が少しうつむく。その口元には消え入りそうな微笑が浮かんでいた。{/n}「リラエタンが間もなく自由になると思えば、心が躍る…だが、セランスレッシュの従者が今なお、このメイデンワールドの地表を傷つけているのであれば、休んでいる暇はない」

languages.text: {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} bewegt sich minimal und senkt den Kopf. Der Hauch eines Lächelns erscheint auf ihren Lippen.{/n} "Mein Herz singt bei dem Gedanken an die baldige Befreiung von Lileath ... aber wir dürfen nicht ruhen, solange Sai'lanthreshs Diener noch das Antlitz der Jungfernwelt verunzieren."
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} shifts slightly and lowers her head. A ghost of a smile appears on her lips.{/n} "My heart sings at the thought of the Lilaethan's approaching liberation... but we must not rest while Sai'lanthresh's servants still mar the face of the Maiden World."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} bewegt sich minimal und senkt den Kopf. Der Hauch eines Lächelns erscheint auf ihren Lippen.{/n} "Mein Herz singt bei dem Gedanken an die baldige Befreiung von Lileath ... aber wir dürfen nicht ruhen, solange Sai'lanthreshs Diener noch das Antlitz der Jungfernwelt verunzieren."

languages.text: {n}L'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} bouge légèrement et baisse la tête. L'esquisse d'un sourire apparaît sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Mon cœur chante à l'idée que la lilaethan approche de sa libération... mais nous ne connaîtrons pas le répit tant que les serviteurs de Sai'lanthresh continueront à souiller la surface du monde vierge. »
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} shifts slightly and lowers her head. A ghost of a smile appears on her lips.{/n} "My heart sings at the thought of the Lilaethan's approaching liberation... but we must not rest while Sai'lanthresh's servants still mar the face of the Maiden World."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} bouge légèrement et baisse la tête. L'esquisse d'un sourire apparaît sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Mon cœur chante à l'idée que la lilaethan approche de sa libération... mais nous ne connaîtrons pas le répit tant que les serviteurs de Sai'lanthresh continueront à souiller la surface du monde vierge. »

languages.text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} se mueve, nerviosa, y agacha la cabeza. Esboza una leve sonrisa.{/n} «Mi corazón canta cuando pienso en la inminente liberación del Lilaethan... pero no podemos descansar mientras los siervos de Sai'lanthresh sigan mancillando el rostro del mundo virgen».
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} shifts slightly and lowers her head. A ghost of a smile appears on her lips.{/n} "My heart sings at the thought of the Lilaethan's approaching liberation... but we must not rest while Sai'lanthresh's servants still mar the face of the Maiden World."

traits.locale_text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} se mueve, nerviosa, y agacha la cabeza. Esboza una leve sonrisa.{/n} «Mi corazón canta cuando pienso en la inminente liberación del Lilaethan... pero no podemos descansar mientras los siervos de Sai'lanthresh sigan mancillando el rostro del mundo virgen».

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} hafifçe kımıldanıp başını eğiyor. Dudaklarında belli belirsiz bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Lilaethan'ın kurtuluşunun yakın olduğunu düşündükçe gönlüm bir hoş oluyor... Yine de Sai'lanthresh'in hizmetkârları Bakir Dünya'nın çehresine leke sürmeyi sürdürürken durmak bize yaraşmaz."
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} shifts slightly and lowers her head. A ghost of a smile appears on her lips.{/n} "My heart sings at the thought of the Lilaethan's approaching liberation... but we must not rest while Sai'lanthresh's servants still mar the face of the Maiden World."

Dudaklarında belli belirsiz bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Lilaethan'ın kurtuluşunun yakın olduğunu düşündükçe gönlüm bir hoş oluyor... Yine de Sai'lanthresh'in hizmetkârları Bakire Dünya'nın çehresine leke sürmeyi sürdürürken durmak bize yaraşmaz."
